Name: Parisian Spring Punch
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist..
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Dry apple and upmarket cider. Perfect for parties.
History: Dick Bradsell's riff on his own Russian Spring Punch .
Nutrition: One serving of Parisian Spring Punch contains 186 calories
